mdRecord.dcterms:title: Americae nova tabula / auct. Guiljelmo Blaeuw
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Blaeu, Willem Janszoon, 1571-1638 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map : hand-col. ; 36 x 46 cm. on sheet 44 x 58 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A derivitive of Blaeu's 1617 map, Burden's State 4, 1642+, with newly engraved sea around embellishments, especially in area found within 10⁰ and 20⁰ S, 240⁰ and 250⁰ longitude. [original]
From an edition of Theatre du monde, published between 1644 and 1658. [original]

Text on verso: 1st leaf, caption title L'Amerique." With "L'Amerique" on signature line, signature mark "A" and catchword "bien"; 2nd leaf: running title: Description de l'Amerique"; catchword "n'ayant." [original]
Includes illustrations of ships and sea creatures, an inset of Greenland, 9 city views along the top margin, and 10 images of Native Americans along the sides. [original]
Text in Latin; text on verso in French. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Tracy W. McGregor Library of American History. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: America--Maps--Early works to 1800
